response.homeDescription: This gorgeous 2 bedroom duplex has been meticulously designed to create an atmosphere of luxurious comfort. Customized natural wood cabinets complement the fantastic Hudson River view while providing ample storage. Large windows with South West exposure allow for lovely sunshine throughout the day and a sparkling city skyline view at night. The renovated cook's kitchen offers a wine cooler and plenty of counter space. The large en suite bathrooms feature marble tiles and jacuzzi bathtubs.Living at Metropolitan Tower is truly a five star experience. Understated elegance is the hallmark of this exclusive residential tower. Enjoy the services of your own private dining club, swimming pool, health club-spa, maid service and valet. Be catered to by the premier concierge service New York has to offer.
